ComicInfo.Summary:
With the Chief Judge's bunker invaded Judge Dredd broadcast to Mega-City One to resist the invaders in an all out guerilla war, realizing that they probably won't care.
Rogue finally finds Buzzard (the traitor) but has to choose between vengeance and preventing the death of 100's of prisoners due to an uprising.
